import React from 'react' import "../Public.css" import {Image,Container} from "semantic-ui-react"; const about = () => { return (

| About |



{/*



*/}

Our EasyClub site is a virtual club cards management site.

The site will allow enterprises to purchase its services to manage the store's club card area.

The site will allow customers to check their club card data at all stores connected to the site.

Beyond management and concentration of information.

The site will be able to give benefits to the customer according to the customer rating on the site. The benefits will be given to you according to the criteria

Which the manager marked when purchasing a business card.

| Why it's worth my enterprise |

Customer Watch When a customer knows that all the details about

the tickets are accessible to him at all times and he is aware of the expressions

and discounts it will cause him to purchase a ticket Second thing the app gives a convenient interface to the page manager

who can manage the store's club cards Including the promotions





| Why it's worth me |

For the wind it is worth and even very much consumed

Because he has a place where all the club cards he has are concentrated

And he can go in and check out where, in which store he has a club and what his condition is:

How many points has he accumulated and what promotions he has

And it also has an on-site purchase option.

) } export default about
